author: rcmatthews
msg: When setting date on FixtureClock the time zone is set to UTC so that different locale settings don't change the clocks absolute time.

author: dkhaywood
msg: NO RCP: added a simple (experimental) scale part for integers.

author: dkhaywood
msg: NO RCP: scalar features now setup as model listeners (meaning that if there are multiple UI representations of a property part, then they get updated in sync).

author: dkhaywood
msg: NOF: added model listeners for scalar features.

author: dkhaywood
msg: NO RCP: changed getUiValue -> getPendingValue throughout, now delegates to metamodel (getModel()#getPendingValue()); also commented out the formatted text data part for now.
